          <title>
            <string language="en">Left-hand rule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Linke Richtlinie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Règle à gauche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Régua da mão esquerda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Regola a mano sinistra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αριστερός κανόνας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Regla izquierda</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows Fleming's left hand rule for prediction of the direction of the force caused by a magnetic field.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fleming</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">prediction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">first finger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">left-hand rule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">second finger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thumb</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß linke richtlinie
Flemings Handfür Vorhersage der Richtung der Kraft, die durch ein 
magnetisches verursacht wird, auffangen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la règle de la main 
gauche de Fleming pour la prévision de la direction de la force 
provoquée par un champ magnétique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a régua da mão 
esquerda de Fleming para a predição do sentido da força causada por
um campo magnético.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la regola della mano 
sinistra del Fleming per la previsione del senso della forza causata 
da un campo magnetico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει αριστερό κανόνα 
Fleming για την πρόβλεψη της κατεύθυνσης της δύναμης που 
προκαλείται από ένα μαγνητικό πεδίο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la regla de la mano 
izquierda de Fleming para la predicción de la dirección de la fuerza
causada por un campo magnético.</string>
          </description>
